mapper.insert:
insert into activityrecommend
activityId,
branchId,
websiteType,
#{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{websitetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT c.*,a.*,c.activityName,c.registeryfee from activityrecommend a,employee e,branch b,activity c where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and a.activityId = c.activityId and a.websiteType = '分店官网' and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from employee e,branch b,activityrecommend a where e.employeeId = b.employeeId and b.branchId = a.branchId and e.employeeId = #{employeeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
